Replace.Text: Base Tech Cost
x0.25 Base Cost
All technologies in the game have their [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost reduced to 25%.
x0.5 Base Cost
All technologies in the game have their [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost reduced to 50%.
x0.75 Base Cost
All technologies in the game have their [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost reduced to 75%.
x1 Base Cost
All technologies in the game have their regular [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost.
x1.25 Base Cost

Tech Cost Scaling
No Scaling
The [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost of technologies will not be scaled, and will only be affected by the Base Tech Cost set above.
Low Era Scaling

The [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost of technologies will be slightly scaled by era, after being multiplied by the Base Tech Cost set above.[NEWLINE]Classical Era: 110%[NEWLINE]Medieval Era: 115%[NEWLINE]Renaissance Era: 120%[NEWLINE]Industrial Era: 125%[NEWLINE]Modern Era: 130%[NEWLINE]Atomic Era: 138%[NEWLINE]Information Era: 145%[NEWLINE]Future Era: 150%
Moderate Era Scaling

The [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost of technologies will be moderately scaled by era, after being multiplied by the Base Tech Cost set above.[NEWLINE]Classical Era: 110%[NEWLINE]Medieval Era: 120%[NEWLINE]Renaissance Era: 135%[NEWLINE]Industrial Era: 145%[NEWLINE]Modern Era: 158%[NEWLINE]Atomic Era: 170%[NEWLINE]Information Era: 180%[NEWLINE]Future Era: 190%
High Era Scaling

The [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost of technologies will be greatly scaled by era, after being multiplied by the Base Tech Cost set above.[NEWLINE]Classical Era: 120%[NEWLINE]Medieval Era: 140%[NEWLINE]Renaissance Era: 160%[NEWLINE]Industrial Era: 180%[NEWLINE]Modern Era: 200%[NEWLINE]Atomic Era: 230%[NEWLINE]Information Era: 260%[NEWLINE]Future Era: 290%
Extreme Era Scaling

The [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost of technologies will be extremely scaled by era, after being multiplied by the Base Tech Cost set above.[NEWLINE]Classical Era: 130%[NEWLINE]Medieval Era: 170%[NEWLINE]Renaissance Era: 220%[NEWLINE]Industrial Era: 260%[NEWLINE]Modern Era: 320%[NEWLINE]Atomic Era: 400%[NEWLINE]Information Era: 460%[NEWLINE]Future Era: 550%
Civic Cost Scaling
The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of civics will not be scaled, and will only be affected by the Base Civic Cost set above.

The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of civics will be slightly scaled by era, after being multiplied by the Base Civic Cost set above.[NEWLINE]Classical Era: 110%[NEWLINE]Medieval Era: 115%[NEWLINE]Renaissance Era: 120%[NEWLINE]Industrial Era: 125%[NEWLINE]Modern Era: 130%[NEWLINE]Atomic Era: 138%[NEWLINE]Information Era: 145%[NEWLINE]Future Era: 150%

The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of civics will be moderately scaled by era, after being multiplied by the Base Civic Cost set above.[NEWLINE]Classical Era: 110%[NEWLINE]Medieval Era: 120%[NEWLINE]Renaissance Era: 135%[NEWLINE]Industrial Era: 145%[NEWLINE]Modern Era: 158%[NEWLINE]Atomic Era: 170%[NEWLINE]Information Era: 180%[NEWLINE]Future Era: 190%

The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of civics will be greatly scaled by era, after being multiplied by the Base Civic Cost set above.[NEWLINE]Classical Era: 120%[NEWLINE]Medieval Era: 140%[NEWLINE]Renaissance Era: 160%[NEWLINE]Industrial Era: 180%[NEWLINE]Modern Era: 200%[NEWLINE]Atomic Era: 230%[NEWLINE]Information Era: 260%[NEWLINE]Future Era: 290%

The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of civics will be extremely scaled by era, after being multiplied by the Base Civic Cost set above.[NEWLINE]Classical Era: 130%[NEWLINE]Medieval Era: 170%[NEWLINE]Renaissance Era: 220%[NEWLINE]Industrial Era: 260%[NEWLINE]Modern Era: 320%[NEWLINE]Atomic Era: 400%[NEWLINE]Information Era: 460%[NEWLINE]Future Era: 550%
Eureka Amount

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 5% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 15% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 10% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 20% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 15% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 25% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 20% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 30% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 25% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 35% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 33% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 43% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 40% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 50% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 50% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 60% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 67% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 77% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 75% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 85% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 85% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China will receive 95% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 100% of the technology cost after Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China also will receive 100% of the technology.[ENDCOLOR]
50% of Original Cost

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 50% of the original technology cost before Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China's eureka bonus will scale based on the Base Tech Cost selected above.[ENDCOLOR]
100% of Original Cost

[ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eurekas are worth 100% of the original technology cost before Base Tech Cost and Tech Cost Scaling has been applied.[NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] [COLOR_FLOAT_SCIENCE]China's eureka bonus will scale based on the Base Tech Cost selected above.[ENDCOLOR]

World Era Scaling

Era Score Scaling
Calculated
The amount of [ICON_GLORY_NORMAL_AGE] Era Score needed to reach normal and golden ages are calculated using the base and scaling costs selected above.
x0.25 Score Requirement
The amount of [ICON_GLORY_NORMAL_AGE] Era Score needed to reach normal and golden ages is reduced to 25%.
x0.5 Score Requirement
The amount of [ICON_GLORY_NORMAL_AGE] Era Score needed to reach normal and golden ages is reduced to 50%.
x1 Score Requirement
The amount of [ICON_GLORY_NORMAL_AGE] Era Score needed to reach normal and golden ages is unchanged.
x1.2 Score Requirement

The amount of [ICON_GLORY_NORMAL_AGE] Era Score needed to reach normal and golden ages is increased to 300%.

x7 Score Requirement
The amount of [ICON_GLORY_NORMAL_AGE] Era Score needed to reach normal and golden ages is increased to 700%.
CO2 Scaling
Calculated
The amount of emissions needed to cause a change in temperature is calculated using the base and scaling costs selected above.
x0.25 CO2 Requirement
The amount of emissions needed to cause a change in temperature is reduced to 25%.
x0.5 CO2 Requirement
The amount of emissions needed to cause a change in temperature is reduced to 50%.
x1 CO2 Requirement

x7 CO2 Requirement
